body_html:
This function exists in the 1.0 branch: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.0/tensorflow/contrib/seq2seq/python/ops/attention_decoder_fn.py#L134

However, it was recently deleted from master: d46937f

I suggest either using 1.0, or looking at the code currently in master: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/seq2seq/python/ops

If you have further questions about using seq2seq, please ask on StackOverflow (we try to keep Github issues focused on bugs and feature requests).

body:
This function exists in the 1.0 branch: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.0/tensorflow/contrib/seq2seq/python/ops/attention_decoder_fn.py#L134

However, it was recently deleted from master: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/d46937f3684d3be2285f7401c2f471f542d147c2

I suggest either using 1.0, or looking at the code currently in master: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/seq2seq/python/ops

If you have further questions about using seq2seq, please ask on [StackOverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/tensorflow) (we try to keep Github issues focused on bugs and feature requests).
